Question
========

We assume that the events of the birth of a girl or a boy are independent of each other. One family has 3 children. Calculate the probability of two boys.

Answerlist
----------

* 1/3
* 1/8
* 2/8
* 3/8

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* 1/3: Incorrect
* 1/8: Incorrect
* 2/8: Incorrect
* 3/8: Correct
